*|Doctor Evidence-Sanofi Post-training email|*
Dear {!Contact.Name}, Thank you for attending the first part of our Intermediate Training. Please find attached the slide decks from the presentation. We look forward to seeing you at the follow-up training on November 16, 2017, where you'll learn to prepare data for analyses, and conduct analyses
Please don't hesitate to be in touch with any comments, suggestions or questions.
Thank You,
Nancy Morgan Director of Learning and Development Doctor Evidence 301 Arizona Ave Suite 301 Santa Monica CA 90401 847-507-1451
